title: Run Seed + Deterministic Replay
purpose: Every run is generated from a seed so outcomes are reproducible (for replays, challenges, and anti-cheat). The seed drives deck shuffles, macro schedule, and social chaos windows. Sharing a run shares the seed + your decisions, not just the result.

title: 12‑Minute Run Clock + Turn Timer
purpose: Runs are short, tense, and losable fast. The clock is real-time: each turn has a decision timer; unused time converts into 'Inertia' that increases Missed Opportunity odds. When the run clock hits zero, any unresolved liabilities can wipe you.

title: Solvency Wipe Conditions
purpose: Define 'death' clearly: cash < 0 with owed amount, forced sale chain that can't clear debt service, or macro-decay pushing cash to zero at end-of-rotation. Wipes end the run and snapshot the clip-worthy cause.

title: Deck Reactor (Dynamic Draw Mixing)
purpose: A deterministic 'reactor' chooses which deck to draw from each turn based on macro.creditTightness, player state (leverage, shields), and recent pass streaks. This is the digital equivalent of your recommended deck mixing rules.

title: Macro State + Cash Decay Loop
purpose: Macro Shift sets inflation (1–5) and credit tightness. End-of-rotation applies cash decay to idle cash. The UI makes this visible as a looming 'erosion meter' so players feel time pressure.

title: Cashflow Tick Engine (Assets + IPA)
purpose: At defined cadence (per turn or per round), assets + IPA produce monthly cashflow. Digital adds an 'auto-ledger' that itemizes sources and shows how close you are to escaping the current tier.

title: Leverage Purchase Resolver (Buff Order)
purpose: Purchasing big deals executes strict resolution order: leverage blocks → downpay credits → debt service credits/penalties. The app prevents illegal buys and shows exactly why you can’t afford something.

title: Shield / Cancel System
purpose: Shields cancel the next FUBAR or SO (or forced sale). Digital adds 'shield windows' so friends can donate a shield in clutch moments, creating shareable saves.

title: Opportunity Window + Open‑Table Auction
purpose: Passing on certain opportunities opens a timed auction to the table (or your friend list). If someone buys your passed deal, you get a small 'regret kick' + the clip labels it as a missed bag moment.

title: Market Pulse Exit Engine
purpose: Market Pulse cards create liquidation windows (sell eligible asset, forced sale, cashout offers). Digital adds a one-tap 'exit simulation' so players can see best/worst exits fast under time pressure.

title: Missed Opportunity Streak & Inertia Tax
purpose: Repeated hesitation triggers Missed Opportunity cards automatically. Digital tracks a visible 'hesitation meter' and injects inertia penalties (cash loss, turn loss, open-table reveal).

title: FUBAR Escalation Ladder
purpose: Small doodads stack into crises. Conditional FUBARs read your portfolio to compute the right pain. The ladder guarantees a 'FUBAR killed me' moment if you ignore risk too long.

title: Systemic Friction Modules (SO)
purpose: SO isn’t random annoyance—it's a module system: loan denials, delays, fees, leverage blocks. Modules are season-rotated so the meta changes without rewriting decks.

title: Disadvantage Draft (Run Start)
purpose: Instead of a flat start, players draft 1 disadvantage (and optionally 1 privilege) that shapes the run. Digital keeps it non-preachy by framing disadvantages as constraints, not moral judgment.

title: Social Chaos Tokens (Friends as Co‑Authors)
purpose: Each run grants limited 'Chaos Tokens' to your invited friends: they can trigger boosts, dilemmas, or minor FUBARs during specific windows. This makes your best moments socially authored.

title: Live Table Trigger: 'Hot Seat Vote'
purpose: At key decisions, the table can force a 10‑second vote: buy vs pass, sell vs hold. You can override once per run (at a cost). Great for opportunity flips and regret moments.

title: Clutch Assist: Friend Bailouts
purpose: Friends can send one bailout per run (cash grant, shield, downpay credit) using earned tokens. Bailouts are logged and rendered as shareable 'saved by ___' moments.

title: Rival Sabotage: Controlled Griefing
purpose: Allow adversarial play without ruining fairness: a rival can spend tokens to increase your next deck’s 'friction' weighting, but only within bounded ranges and with full disclosure post-run.

title: Season System (Rule Modules + Rewards)
purpose: Seasons rotate rule modules (macro volatility, credit tightness baseline, deck weights, social token budgets). Rewards are cosmetic + meta-unlocks that don’t pay-to-win.

title: Macro Shock Scheduler (Live Economy)
purpose: A server-driven schedule injects macro shocks (rate hikes, liquidity crunch, boom cycles). Shocks are seeded per season so runs are comparable while still feeling alive.

title: Meta‑Progression: Unlockable Rule Modules
purpose: Winning or dying unlocks modules: new starting loadouts, new chaos token types, new deck mix presets. Meta progression is about options, not raw power.

title: Moment Forge: 3‑Moment Guarantee System
purpose: The engine tracks whether your run has produced: (1) FUBAR kill/scare, (2) opportunity flip, (3) missed bag. If not, it gently nudges probabilities (within the seed) to surface those beats before the run ends.

title: Auto‑Clip + Caption Packager
purpose: Every share moment generates a 10–20s replay: state before, decision, outcome, and a caption template. One-tap share to socials or to your friend table feed.

title: Challenge Links: Seed + Decision Ghosts
purpose: Players can share a challenge link that loads the same seed and shows a 'ghost' of their decision timeline. Friends can try to beat the outcome and post their own flips.

title: Personal Improvement Overlay (Optional Metrics)
purpose: Optional layer that measures decisions (speed, risk balance, pass streaks, diversification) and gives neutral feedback. No preaching—just dashboards and tiny experiments you can toggle on/off.
